bibl.title: New Light on Ancient Greek Exorcisms of the Wandering Womb.
bibl.note: The Two Previously Known Texts [P.G.M. VII, 260-271; - P.G.M. 12, 5-15]. - The Three New Texts [amulet from Beirut; - Aramaic recipe; - amulet from West Deeping, England]. - A Comparative Analysis of the Commands. - New Insights into the Old Texts.
bibl.seg: FARAONE Christopher A., New Light on Ancient Greek Exorcisms of the Wandering Womb.

The Two Previously Known Texts [P.G.M. VII, 260-271; - P.G.M. 12, 5-15]. - The Three New Texts [amulet from Beirut; - Aramaic recipe; - amulet from West Deeping, England]. - A Comparative Analysis of the Commands. - New Insights into the Old Texts.
